name: Mo Magic
description: MAGIC Programs’ overarching objective is to prevent juvenile contact with the juvenile and criminal justice system by empowering community organizations to solve systemic problems. By partnering with nonprofit organizations and service providers that focus on the educational, economic, health, and juvenile justice needs of disadvantaged children, youth, and their families.

By partnering with nonprofit organizations and service providers that focus on the educational, economic, health, and juvenile justice needs of disadvantaged children, youth, and their families.
